wikipedia_page.main: Robert Dunlop "Bobby" Sinclair (29 June 1915 – 2 July 1993) was a Scottish professional footballer who played in the Scottish First Division for Falkirk in the 1930s and in the Football League in England for Darlington in the years following the Second World War. He played as an outside right.

response: * Bobby Sinclair (1915–1993), Scottish footballer for Falkirk and Darlington
